channel.title: Round Effect - Tag - MAUI, c'est clair !
channel.description: Round Effect - Tag - MAUI, c'est clair !

item.title: Create animations in .NET MAUI for a disco atmosphere
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: In this final episode, we'll be creating animations with .NET MAUI to set the mood for a crazy night. Put on your sunglasses, because there will be flashes everywhere!

item.title: Music player display - Media playback
item.author: Jean-Emmanuel BAILLAT
item.description: More and more buttons! In this chapter, we will integrate the controls for manipulating the media.
